component.name: blPop
component.description: remove and get the first element in a list or block until one is available

component.name: brPop
component.description: remove an get the element in a list or block one is available

component.name: lInsert
component.description: insert an element before or after another element in a list

component.name: lLen
component.description: get a length of a list

component.name: lPop
component.description: remove and get the first element in a list

component.name: lPush
component.description: prepend one or multiple values to a list

component.name: lPushX
component.description: prepend a value of an element in a list by its index

component.name: lRange
component.description: get a range of elements from a list

component.name: lSet
component.description: set the value of an element in a list by it's index

component.name: lTrim
component.description: trim a list to the specified range

component.name: rPopLPush
component.description: remove the list element in a list, prepend it to another list and return it

component.name: rPush
component.description: append one or more multiple values to a list

component.name: rPushX
component.description: append a value to a list, only if the list exists
